title: Homem
body: This family name originates from: Garcia Homem de Sousa, who married Catarina Gonçalves da Câmara, daughter of Zargo; from Francisco Homem de Gouveia, a nobleman of the house of D. Manuel who lived in Estreito da Calheta, where he established an entail in 1529; from Francisco Homem d'El-Rei, who lived in Calheta at the beginning of the 16th century; and from Rui Fernandes Homem, the natural son of Fernão Homem and nephew of the aforementioned Garcia Homem de Sousa.

Estreito da Calheta: Location where Francisco Homem de Gouveia lived and established an entail in 1529
Calheta: Location where Francisco Homem d'El-Rei lived at the beginning of the 16th century

Garcia Homem de Sousa: Married Catarina Gonçalves da Câmara, daughter of Zargo
Francisco Homem de Gouveia: Nobleman of the house of D. Manuel
Francisco Homem d'El-Rei: Lived in Calheta at the beginning of the 16th century
Rui Fernandes Homem: Natural son of Fernão Homem and nephew of the aforementioned Garcia Homem de Sousa

1529: Year in which Francisco Homem de Gouveia established an entail in Estreito da Calheta
